attributes.action: Increase efforts to reclaim covid-19 payments lost to fraud
attributes.additional_details: This is taxpayer's money, and writing off these funds would be unacceptable.
attributes.background: It has been widely reported that the Government expects not to reclaim £4.3 billion of Covid payments that were claimed fraudulently. We believe the Government should make every effort to recoup this money and ensure anyone who committed fraud is brought to justice.
